name: test-master
description: Complete Vitest 4.0 Playwright 1.55 MSW 2.x testing system with 2025 best practices. PROACTIVELY activate for: (1) ANY testing task (unit/integration/E2E/visual), (2) Browser Mode testing (Vitest 4.0 stable), (3) Visual regression testing (toMatchSnapshot), (4) Playwright AI Test Agents (planner/generator/healer), (5) Test annotation and metadata (Vitest 3.2+), (6) Mutation testing for quality assurance, (7) Test creation and scaffolding, (8) Playwright Traces debugging with titlePath, (9) Coverage analysis and optimization, (10) MSW 2.11+ mock management with happy-path-first patterns, (11) Role-based locator patterns, (12) CI/CD test setup, (13) Multi-project test architecture, (14) Line-number filtering. Provides: Vitest 4.0 features (stable browser mode, visual regression, type-aware hooks), Playwright 1.55 features (titlePath hierarchy, Debian 13, AI test agents), MSW 2.11+ best practices (Fetch API primitives, domain-based handlers), mutation testing capabilities, intelligent test running, auto-scaffolding with boilerplate, coverage gap analysis, advanced snapshot management, parallel execution optimization, and comprehensive 2025-compliant test infrastructure. Ensures production-ready testing with latest patterns across all modern JavaScript projects.
